game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is torn apart, and ancient civilizations have left behind remnants of their advanced technology. Players take on the role of a temporal archaeologist tasked with uncovering the secrets of the past to restore the timeline.
game.beginning: The game begins in the present day, where the player's character discovers a mysterious artifact that allows them to travel through time. They are recruited by a secret organization dedicated to preserving the timestream and tasked with repairing anomalies throughout history.
game.ending: As the player progresses through the game, they uncover a conspiracy threatening the very fabric of reality. The ultimate goal is to reach the source of the timestream's corruption and make a choice that will determine the fate of eternity: restore the original timeline or forge a new path, altering the course of history forever.
